content: baby rainbow this pattern is written in uk terms hook size 3 5mm hook throughout wool double knitting colour a - blue colour b - green colour c - yellow colour d - orange colour e - red/pink abbreviations uk terms double_crochet - double_crochet chain - chain st - stitch magic_ring - magic_ring slip_stitch - slip_stitch round - round finished rainbow measures roughly 6cm along the base and 3cm tall in the centre rainbow using colour a make a magic_ring round 1 4dc into magic_ring 4 sts fasten_off colour a do not turn work between rounds round 2 join colour b to first double_crochet of round 1 ch1 does not count as st throughout 2dc in same st 2dc into each st to end 8 sts fasten_off colour b round 3 join colour c to first double_crochet of round 2 ch1 2dc in same st 1dc in next st 2dc in next st double_crochet in next st twice more 12 sts fasten_off colour c round 4 join colour d to first double_crochet of round 3 ch1 2dc in same st 1dc in next 2 sts 2dc in next st double_crochet in next 2 sts twice more 16 sts fasten_off colour d round 5 join colour e to first double_crochet of round 4 ch1 double_crochet in same st 2dc in next st double_crochet in next 3 sts twice 2dc in next st double_crochet in next 2 sts 20 sts fasten_off colour e sew in all the loose ends baby rainbow | no 1 | love woolcraft 2020 these baby rainbows will bring the brightness to anything you desire there are so many versions of these crochet rainbows out there with super similar patterns after all it is just a half circle so this is just how i like to make them they are the perfect little decoration for a desk or they look amazing as a keyring you can mix and match your colours as you please or even keep going in the same format to make bigger rainbows i d love to see your own creations share and tag using my socials @love_woolcraft @love_woolcraft @lovewoolcraft this pattern is property of love woolcraft it may not be resold copied or shared items made with this pattern may be sold and shared but love woolcraft should be credited as the designer where appropriate baby rainbow | no 1 | love woolcraft 2020
